text:
Tika (1.0.SNAPSHOT) hangs parsing the word file:

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2371175/testfile002.doc

The current version of tika (0.9) works fine with the same file

I tested it using POI 3.8-beta2
creator: enrico.donelli@gmail.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Fixed in r1095753. IOUtils wasn't handling the case of starting reading from part way into the file, when the file will completely fill the buffer.

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: *** Bug 51461 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
